item.title: [PI] Crash when killing Torms
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

You should really consider change Project Insanity’s drop system. Yes, it is neatly designed, but it is just not fit for a variation of rates, such as: Extremely Rare and Occasional.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Crash when killing Torms
item.dc:creator: @itsfanboy itsfanboy
item.description:
@itsfanboy wrote:

Hey, whenever i finish killing a tormented demon on my server. I get this error:

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

On the line 2096 in NPCHandler.java, i have this:

for(npc = 0; npc < Config.NPC_DROPS.length; npc++){ if(npcs[i].npcType == Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][0]) { if(Misc.random(Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][3]) == 0) { if (c.clanId >= 0) Server.clanChat.handleLootShare(c, Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][1], Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][2]); Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][1], npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][2], c.playerId); } } }

If i were to change:

[code]if(Misc.random(Config.NPC_DROPS[npc][3]) == 0) { [/code]

to:

It would drop all the rares that TD’s drop in one drop and ignore the other common ones :\

I HAVE TEAM VIEWER. PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic
